channel.title: Capital Market - Live News
channel.description: Latest market news and updates from Capital Market

item.title: Rupee closes unchanged
item.description: At 90.7100 per Dollar Category: Other Markets - Foreign Exchange

item.title: GBP/INR futures linger around 123 mark
item.description: GBP/INR futures linger around 123 mark Category: Other Markets - Foreign Exchange

item.title: Dhabriya Polywood arm bags Rs 25-cr orders from Godrej Group
item.description: Dhabriya Polywood announced that its wholly owned subsidiary, Dynasty Modular Furnitures, has received letters of intent (LOIs) from the Godrej Group aggregating to Rs 25.30 crore. Category: Hot Pursuit

item.title: Inflow of foreign funds and positive domestic equity markets drives INR higher
item.description: Inflow of foreign funds and positive domestic equity markets drives INR higher Category: Other Markets - Foreign Exchange

item.title: Benchmarks extend gains for third day; Nifty settles above 25,800
item.description: Benchmarks extend gains for third day; Nifty settles above 25,800 Category: Market Commentary - End-Session

item.title: ICRA reaffirms ratings of Railtel Corporation at 'AA/A1+' with ‘stable’ outlook
item.description: Railtel Corporation of India said that the credit rating agency ICRA has reaffirmed the company’s long-term rating at '[ICRA] AA’ with 'stable’ outlook. Category: Hot Pursuit

item.title: Nifty February futures trade at premium
item.description: NSE India VIX slides 3.55% to 12.22. Category: Market Commentary - Futures Market

item.title: Barometers ends with modest gains; Nifty settles above 25,800 level; VIX drops 3.55%
item.description: Barometers ends with modest gains; Nifty settles above 25,800 level; VIX drops 3.55% Category: Market Commentary - Quick Review Indices

item.title: Bharat Forge gains after inking MoU with VVDN Technologies
item.description: Bharat Forge advanced 1.09% to Rs 1,771.85 after the company signed memorandum of understanding (MoU) with VVDN Technologies, to explore a strategic collaboration across key technology-driven sectors. Category: Hot Pursuit

item.title: RVNL bags Rs 1,201-cr bridge contract from Northern Railway
item.description: Rail Vikas Nigam (RVNL) has received a letter of acceptance (LoA) from Northern Railway for a project worth Rs 1,201.35 crore. Category: Hot Pursuit

item.title: B L Kashyap bags Rs 300-cr order from CRC Greens for Greater Noida housing project
item.description: B. L. Kashyap and Sons announced that it has secured a contract worth Rs 300 crore from CRC Greens for a group housing project in Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh. Category: Hot Pursuit

item.title: Lloyds Metal and Energy climbs after LGRF incorporates subsidiary in DMCC zone
item.description: Lloyds Metals and Energy jumped 3.02% to Rs 1211.85 after the company’s wholly owned subsidiary, Lloyds Global Resources FZCO (LGRF) has incorporated a subsidiary, Virtus Lloyds Resources FZCO(Virtus) in Dubai Multi Commodities Centre Zone (DMCC). Category: Hot Pursuit

item.title: Quick Wrap: Nifty Metal Index records a surge of 1.33%
item.description: Quick Wrap: Nifty Metal Index records a surge of 1.33% Category: Market Commentary - End-Session

item.title: Sensex settles 283 pts higher; Nifty ends above 25,800 level
item.description: Sensex settles 283 pts higher; Nifty ends above 25,800 level Category: Market Commentary - Quick Review

item.title: Aptech bags Rs 4-cr contract from state government body for computer-based exam
item.description: Aptech announced that it has secured a contract worth an estimated Rs 4.18 crore from a state government body to conduct a computer-based examination. Category: Hot Pursuit

item.title: Airfloa Rail Technology secures Rs 12-cr order from Integral Coach Factory
item.description: Airfloa Rail Technology has announced that it has received a new domestic order worth Rs 11.78 crore from the Furnishing Division of Integral Coach Factory, Chennai. Category: Hot Pursuit

item.title: Adani Green Energy’s arm incorporates new wholly-owned subsidiary Skyspin Energy
item.description: Adani Green Energy has announced that its wholly-owned subsidiary, Adani Renewable Energy Holding Eleven (AREH11L), has incorporated a new wholly-owned subsidiary, Skyspin Energy, on 17 February 2026. Category: Hot Pursuit

item.title: Brainbees Solutions Ltd leads losers in 'A' group
item.description: IIFL Capital Services Ltd, Hexaware Technologies Ltd, V I P Industries Ltd and Waaree Energies Ltd are among the other losers in the BSE's 'A' group today, 18 February 2026. Category: Hot Pursuit

item.title: E2E Networks clarifies NVIDIA tie-up; says no new deal beyond earlier disclosure
item.description: E2E Networks has issued a clarification to the National Stock Exchange stating that reports on its collaboration with NVIDIA do not relate to any new or recently concluded commercial arrangement. Category: Hot Pursuit

item.title: Netweb Tech sizzles after launching NVIDIA powered-AI supercomputers
item.description: Netweb Technologies India surged 9.24% to Rs 3385.40 after the company launched artificial intelligence (AI) supercomputing systems, Tyrone Camarero Spark and Tyrone Supercomputing Systems powered by NVIDIA Sovereign AI Development. Category: Hot Pursuit
